Product_ID-P004.Product_Name: Innofoods Organic Dark Chocolate Nuggets with Coconut & Super Seeds
Product_ID-P004.Description: Innofoods Organic Dark Chocolate Nuggets with Coconut & Super Seeds,It all starts with a premium Belgium couverture dark chocolate. The difference? A quality,flavor and texture that has no comparison. Free from the additional of emulsifiers (soy lecithin, vegetable oils), our chocolate is as pure as the smile that comes with it.
